item.title: Celebrate National Day with the One Lagi Best Deal!
item.description:
Source: One Faber Group. Cable car visual. In honor of Singaporeâ€™s 52nd birthday, One Faber Group is offering the One Lagi Best Deal, featuring local promotions on its leisure activities and services from Faber Peak Singapore to Sentosa Island. Until September 17th, Singaporeans* can take advantage of a special offer: a S$52 bundle for adults and a S$42 bundle for children. The adult bundle includes a round-trip Singapore cable car ride, a standard ticket to the Wings Of Time show, a standard ticket to Sentosa Merlion, a three-course meal at the Good Old Days restaurant, and a batik orchid magnet...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/celebrate-national-day-with-the-one-lagi-best-deal/
